author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GABRIELLE HOLDING STEADY OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...GABRIELLE HOLDING STEADY OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 PM AST Thu Sep 18 the center of Gabrielle was located near 21.2, -53.4 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GABRIELLE HOLDING STEADY OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 PM AST Thu Sep 18 the center of Gabrielle was located near 21.2, -53.4 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
